short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Task Buddy Tab New Tab is a free simple upgraded tool that provides an excellent customer experience powered by Bing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Buddy Tab is an affordable and convenient New Tab extension designed specifically to manage your daily needs.
This extension will allow you set up a beautiful simplified New Tab page that includes search provided by Bing, clock, background that is automatically changes once in a while, and an inspiring quote from prominent person to make you feel more productive and inspired to streamline you daily routine.

Task Buddy Tab is the number one extension for productivity.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Task Buddy Tab" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at https://taskbuddytab.com/
Read About us: https://taskbuddytab.com/about-tab/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://taskbuddytab.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://taskbuddytab.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://taskbuddytab.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/
